skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: I am a fullstack developer with extensive experience in building web applications. Here are some of my core competencies:

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on recently. Each project showcases my skills and dedication to delivering high-quality solutions.

jobs.title: Join
jobs.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories. In this project, I learned how to implement Firebase as a backend-as-a-service for real-time data synchronisation and user management. The development of the Kanban board with drag & drop gave me valuable insights into the design of interactive user interfaces.

jobs.title: Pokedex
jobs.description: An interactive Pokémon encyclopaedia that retrieves data via a REST API and displays detailed information about each Pokémon. The application offers a responsive user interface with search and filter functions. This project taught me how to communicate effectively with REST APIs and process the data received dynamically. The implementation of search functions and filters deepened my understanding of data manipulation and asynchronous programming.

jobs.title: Dark Magic
jobs.description: A jump-and-run game developed with JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas. It offers simple controls and appealing gameplay. In this project, I learnt the basics of object-oriented programming (OOP) with classes and inheritance. The implementation of game logic and character movements gave me a deep understanding of structuring code with OOP.
